storyInfo: Lee and his old friend Liang Xun chat merrily, while Kroos runs into Taihe, who previously encountered Rhodes Island in Lungmen, along with a mysterious youth—and when Lee retires for the night, he finds an unexpected guest awaiting him.

attributes.content: The cold spell of springtide.
It hearkens me back to many scenes of the past: my academic pursuits, my career in business, my training in the martial arts, and my entrance into politics.
In those bygone times, we were inseparable. Kind friends and mentors were always there for us, each of them hoping to realize their own grand aspirations.
What about now?
The green bricks have yet to be cleaned. Spring has long since begun, yet the snow lingers, white as pearls.
It is impossible to know what the man behind the door thinks when it is shut. All you are certain of is that, when it opens, what you know is merely what he wants you to know.
He lifts his head. The door lets out a creak.
Mr. Liang.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Liang Xun... Long time no see.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Indeed. It's been a while.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You've ventured far, Lee.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It was a long journey, and I'd be lying if I said it wasn't arduous. How gaudy of you then, Mr. Liang, to have me travel all this way just to deliver this small trinket.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: All will be explained as soon as I have the time.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I must thank you too, Master Shen. It's early spring. There must be many a traveler seeking to make their way across the waters.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Not at all. I accepted the job, so naturally it's my top priority.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: But now that I've brought him... I think I'll head back to the docks.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Oh right. We ran into a bit of trouble in the city. Lee can fill you in on the details.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Trouble...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You'd best be careful too, sir.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I'll take my leave. The docks must be low on manpower by now. I should hurry back.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Right. Thank you for your work.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Make your way to Shangshu via Zhengshan, and find a boatman named Shen.'
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: See how far your reputation gets you, Mr. Liang? You sent for me with just that one sentence.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This isn't exactly your first time visiting Shangshu.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So what kind of man is this Master Shen?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just a trustworthy boatman. And experienced boatmen can be trusted with your life.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I haven't been introduced to these two...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: (Good gracious, how did I not notice? So this 'Mr. Liang' is the magistrate of Shangshu?!)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (I'm getting pretty used to you overreacting to stuff you missed. What's that mean for us, though?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (He's the head of the city!)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (Knowing how Yan ranks officials, though, doesn't that make him a whole lot lower than Wei Yenwu?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: These two are my... business partners.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It is an honor, Mr. Liang. I'm Ch'u...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Wu-yu. Please call me Mr. Nothing.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: And I'm Kroos. I'm an Operator on deployment from Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals, which has an ongoing business relationship with Mr. Lee.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We only bumped into each other in Shangshu by chance, though. Anyway, it's a pleasure to meet you, Mr. Liang.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: By chance? And here I thought you hired Messengers to escort you from Lungmen...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So you ARE aware that Messengers exist? Then perhaps you should've hired them to run your errands instead of me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It was no trivial matter, and the journey was long. I couldn't trust just anyone.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But you could trust me? Give me a break. What was I supposed to do if I ran into bandits on the way?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you thought it a hassle, you could have written back and refused.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Please, like there'd be another chance with that trinket of yours. By the time your letter made it to me, the smugglers were already in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When did I have time to write back and tell you to find somebody else? I had to get someone looking into them straight away, smashing up their hideout too, while we were at it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh* Fortunately, the kids working for me are more than capable of holding the fort. Otherwise I wouldn't have time for this errand of yours.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Sounds like Waai Fu's MO to me... and I'm guessing Mr. Lee took this as an excuse to skip town rather than deal with everything on his plate.)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Seeing as you are Lee's business partners, we shouldn't be discussing this at the door. Please, come in. We have enough guest rooms for everyone.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What an honor to be personally received by Shangshu's magistrate. Best we accept, then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Please, this way.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You have our thanks, Mr. Liang.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Benefactor, we were just worrying about where to stay the night, and there's still some time until our meeting. Why not get some rest here?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Benefactor?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Nothing... Guess I'm just tired.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Mr. Lee, do we have to tell Mr. Liang about what just happened?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yes, we should...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Look at the sky. It's filled with clouds. It'll probably rain tonight—
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: ...? What's the matter, Lee?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Nothing...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Some landscapes flashed through my mind, is all... Maybe it's been way too long since I last visited Shangshu, and the nostalgia is getting to me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Miss Du... How did it go?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: How did what go? That ugly old Zheng gave me an earful.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What should we do, then?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: I told you. We can't always listen to them.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If that's all we ever do, we won't have a future.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Just do as I say.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Alright. I'll call everyone up.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: How will you deal with the Lungmenite now?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: I'll go see him myself.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Some things are best discussed with an open heart.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: How about a drink?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll pass. I have work later.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You had me travel thousands of li to bring you a wine cup, and you won't indulge me with one little drink?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I went through hell and high water for this thing, you know.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Drink makes fools of us all.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Ah, 'drink makes fools of us all...'
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: One of the Liang Xun of yesteryear's favorite sayings. Full glad I am to know that Mr. Liang still cannot hold his liquor.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And full glad I am to know that you're still that good old foulmouthed Lee.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I've sent someone to investigate what happened at Xingyu Inn.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I doubt things are as simple as they seem. If you really don't know, then no need to stir up the hornet's nest. Such is the society we live in.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Especially when simply waiting for me to leave the city would more or less solve all our troubles.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't need to check on the cup? The roads were bumpy. I could very well have flattened it under my posterior.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you didn't feel it worth mentioning, then it must be safe and sound.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I say you take a look anyway. I hand-delivered this beauty all the way from Lungmen, after all.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So this is it...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Now, indulge my curiosity: what makes it so special? At the price it was going for in the smugglers' auctions, it may as well have been a buy-one-get-one-free sale.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A rumor circulating among the smugglers did catch my attention though. Apparently, this thing was at the center of a ghost story in the village it was found.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do tell.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: They say the cup can make the things around it... come to life.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Is there any proof?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: If there were any proof to a ghost story, you'd have heard about it on the news by now. I only know the rumors.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And what of the smugglers?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: All taken to the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's good to hear.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Actually, there is another matter I would like you to take care of.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, you summoned me all the way from Lungmen. You may as well get your money's worth while I'm here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But for now...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hoh... It seems you won't let me go without sharing a drink with you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: We'll save business for later, then. You haven't changed, old friend. Carefree as always.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Come, sit.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Now you're the master?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How are your days in Lungmen? I heard you're a private investigator now?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Right... And Huai's daughter is staying with me, too. You know, Huai, the kung fu lunatic.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ah, no wonder you asked me to look into his whereabouts all of a sudden.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I've been taking care of Waai Fu for a while now, actually. I even went to her university graduation ceremony in his place. Am I supposed to walk her down the aisle when she gets married too?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Waai Fu's a good girl, but she's got a terrible father.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: His daughter... She's grown so much.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Time flies, Liang Xun.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Indeed...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I heard you took up a job in government, and with your personality and skills I figured you had a bright future ahead of you. Never did I imagine that our reunion would take so many years though.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm sure everyone will be happy to hear you managed to get back on your feet.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hardly. I just realized that some things aren't nearly as much of a headache as figuring out how to put food on the table.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's been a while since I had your cooking...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You're a big shot who governs a large city. Stop looking back so fondly on the tough times we struggled through.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Instead, think back to the times when we lacked opportunities to use our talents, and make sure the youngsters in your city have them. Isn't that what used to vex you the most?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Indeed...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hmm, still, glad to see you're still the type to never, ever, hold a woman.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I was worried I'd come to Shangshu only to find you'd started a family. Which would make me—
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Liang... You have a guest?
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: *Cough*...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Ning... I'm afraid now is not a good time...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: —What do you mean, now isn't a good time? I'm just a Messenger. I'll be taking my leave soon!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Good evening, Mr. Liang... and... Mr. Messenger?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: That's right, young miss.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Explain.)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (She's a coworker.)
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: (Mighty fine coworker you have over at this hour.)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (It's barely past dinnertime.)
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Might you have forgotten our engagement tonight?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: No, it's just...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Please, don't mind me. I have a few errands that just came to mind.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll leave you to it, Mr. Liang. If you need anything else... Ugh, try to finish your business first.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wait, Lee—
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, seems I'm in trouble.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Nothing, mate... We're just looking for some grub. Does this really need to be such a big deal?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's not like Nian's here. I'm fine with whatever. No one's going to complain.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Absolutely not, my benefactor! I must apologize for what happened earlier by finding you the very finest establishment!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Okay... so how come we're in some empty alley?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You don't understand. Everyone in Yan has a handful of hole-in-the-wall eateries they hold dear to their hearts. Flavors that simply cannot be enjoyed anywhere else, no matter how reputable.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You savor the memories, and taste the feelings, and, uh...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You're not even a local... How can anywhere here be dear to your heart?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Now put that travel guide away.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If you insist.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Do you have some kind of four-dimensional pocket? Where are you keeping all those weird books...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And you keep taking us down alleyways too... Trying to lure out the people who attacked us earlier?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We're wards of the city's magistrate! What do we have to be afraid of?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Besides, they are hardly the upstanding sort! Rather than wait for them to come to us, I say we nip this in the bud before our rendezvous with the others.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: The safest play would be to hole up in the Liang estate and contact the closest field office to send Operators to meet us in Shangshu... Hmm...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I've been meaning to ask, but are there many Yanese at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, I don't think there's all that many, but it also feels like I run into them just about everywhere. It's strange—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.text: Infected walking freely in the city?

attributes.content: Benefactor, watch out—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Urgh—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Such a lightning-fast reaction.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: What a surprise.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: What is this about—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Mr. Nothing thinks fast and moves even faster, as do most kung fu practitioners.
However, the brawny man strikes more quickly than even the skip of Mr. Nothing's heartbeat, reaching his throat.
Don't try anything funny.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: Nothing! Don't do it, mate!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Do you know your companion's identity? Did you know she belongs to an Infected organization?
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: Haha... Benefactor, to be quite honest, I'm afraid I couldn't do anything even if I wanted to...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What's more... This is a government official.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What a strange fan you wield. You are a master of your techniques, but you have yet to kill.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: At least you are aware of your weaknesses.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: Have we met...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We have not.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: However, it seems you two are somehow connected to the deputy minister of the Central Judicial Office.
attributes.name: Imposing Man

attributes.content: You mean... Leizi?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Right! I saw you in our Operational Records before! You're...!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Taihe, Deputy Monitor Censor of the Department of Discipline and Supervision.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: De-department of Discipline and Supervision...?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Infected, what is your purpose here in Shangshu?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: What happened at Kou-wu City? Why did Dusk leave the mountains?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: And how is Rhodes Island involved?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: (Benefactor, is this... about Miss Dusk?)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Keeping quiet, are we?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: There is no need to probe Rhodes Island, sir. We've already gone through all the formalities... as Infected.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If you want to know about our Operators' private lives, though, there is truly nothing I can tell you.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Not that I know anything anyway.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Operators...?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: A bestial Sui taking an office job? Unheard of.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: It seems the Central Judicial Office was highly negligent in its handling of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: So you tailed us, huh...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Not at all.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But you won't let us go?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That depends on how cooperative you are.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: No need to be so confrontational, Uncle Taihe.
attributes.name: Young Male Voice

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I've spoken with the other Candleholders to better understand the situation. These... Rhodes Island-related individuals are currently guests of the Shangshu magistrate.
attributes.name: Amiable Young Man

attributes.content: They may be involved with the Mount Hui-ch'i incident, but they clearly mean no offense. We needn't come to blows.
attributes.name: Amiable Young Man

attributes.content: My apologies. Uncle Taihe is usually a quiet man, but for whatever reason he is unusually agitated today.
attributes.name: Amiable Young Man

attributes.content: I am Zuo Le, a... court Messenger. We will leave it at that.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm Kroos, a Rhodes Island Operator.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Chu Wuyou, otherwise known as Rhodes Island Operator Nothing. Although not yet officially.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Ms. Kroos, Mr. Nothing. Please accept my apologies.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I understand the transgression was Uncle Taihe's, but allow me to remind you:
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If you are not too involved with those sisters, I suggest you put an end to that relationship while you still can.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nian's my friend and coworker, and Dusk's my friend's pain-in-the-rear sister. So is that in the 'while we still can' stage or not?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: To tell the truth... You've likely already crossed the line.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Thanks for the tip, then.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ms. Kroos, you're a woman of extraordinary courage and skill.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now we have other business to attend to. Please excuse us.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I hope Magistrate Liang will give the Department of Discipline and Supervision an acceptable answer regarding the Rhodes Island affair.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Excuse us.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Benefactor! Are you okay?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Haha... That gave me such a start, I sprained my ankle. I'm okay, though.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Nothing, mate.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: A Messenger accompanied by the Department of Discipline and Supervision's Deputy Monitir Censor as his retainer... What a load of poppycock. They really took us for fools.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: It seems they're also well aware of the bizarre events in which we found ourselves at Kou-wu City and Mount Hui-ch'i.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Even a fool can glean that the sisters are no ordinary beings, but all this is a little... uh... beyond imagination.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Let's head back to the Liang estate first.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Now's not the time to be wandering around. We need to meet up with them as soon as possible...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: What about him?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Nah... It was probably just some small critter.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis not like you to sigh so much.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Are you so unhappy to see me tonight, my lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Must I have urgent matters to seek your companionship?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: When shall we take to the mountains and see the plays?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The weather is still cold. I heard you've been ill as of late. You should be avoiding the mountains.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis always the case in early spring. It makes me long for the hot tea served at Shuzhou Peak.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Right. I will go with you when I have the time.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: That was your guest, was he not? You were never one to engage in small talk with Messengers.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Perhaps you might settle for 'leave the goods there. Stop wasting my time.'?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: No, I doubt you would say that last part. After all, you are a man of proper etiquette, my lord.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Nothing escapes you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Where is he from?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Lungmen.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So far away! Ah... He came all this way to see you. I should not have intruded.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Not at all. He's not one to mind such trivialities.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: My, how strange... To think you'd say that about someone.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Here I thought you would be the same aloof man to everyone.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: *Cough*... I don't...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What is he doing here?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I... I entrusted some matters to him.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What sorts of matters?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: All trivial.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So you invited an old friend from a thousand li away only for trivial matters...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: If you will not tell me, I shan't ask.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: However, this world is full of hardships. Such is life. If you were to anguish over each and every one of them...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: You would only be overburdening yourself.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Didn't Liang say this guest room was for me to use as I please?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let's ignore the fact that you came into my room uninvited. Why are you making tea? MY tea, mind you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's not yours, it's Mr. Liang's.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: And I made you a cup too. Satisfied?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: So you plan to continue your accusations, Miss Du?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Take a guess.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I don't suppose you're bold enough to try anything in such a pretty mansion.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Why don't you start by telling me why you're here?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Heh, aren't you the confident one? Still carefree enough to make conversation with me.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Well, you made tea.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Alright, fine.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I'll get to the point. I'm here because I need your help.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Now that's odd. I thought you'd be more cautious. Why so agreeable?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Liang Xun let you into his home. What is there to worry about?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you know him?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I pleaded him to let me in, that's all... My father's always had a good relationship with the government.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Last time we met, I was going to steal your cup.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Not mine. Mr. Liang's.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let him deal with the troublesome stuff. I only bother with whatever troubles come my way.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So you'll believe me...?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What reason do I have to hold a grudge against a young lady?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh*... All of us were young once, and all of us have had to put up an act just to save face.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: —W-Who's saving face?! I was—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Did you get in a fight with the innkeeper?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I'm starting to understand just what a terrifying person you are.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You seem lax and carefree, but you actually know everything like the back of your hand—People like you are the most terrifying.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: At the very least, I wouldn't attack someone with a chair on our first meeting.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Now, tell me what this is about. And be honest, this is a negotiation.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Innkeeper Zheng... My father took on a job from a court noble. They want that wine cup of yours.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: About what I figured, but earlier you were helping him with that. Why the sudden change of heart?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I won't go into the details. It's just... I don't want him to succeed.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Will you not believe me if I don't tell you why?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Try not to ask questions that you already know the answer to. You want to come across as sincere.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If he succeeds, it doesn't matter how big a role I played. He'll make me take full credit for it.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The Escort Association has made itself a lot of enemies, and, for all the weight it has to throw around, it's stuck by the old rules even now that the Messenger industry has taken off. They're always left out for being slower to react than everyone else.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: That's why my father always told me to keep my mouth shut, to hide my shortcomings.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: He wants me to act like a frivolous playgirl who pisses away his riches. All so no one will give me a second thought.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Then, I'd secretly run errands for the court, both to curry favor and win over my lackeys.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Only then will he finally entrust me with the family business.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Well, that's an innkeeper for you. Always so calculating.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But I'm not part of the equation.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Whether it's the Du Yaoye who will inherit the Association, or the Miss Du who's always throwing money around, both are what others expect me to be.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: So you want to take this chance to ensure your old man has to stay put and right the ship. That way you won't need to take over as the new innkeeper. Am I getting this right?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Not quite.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The royal court doesn't often come to the Association with a job. If this deal falls through, there is no way my father is going to hand me the keys to the Association just yet.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Most people my age look to me for a way out. I told them that if my father's deal falls through, the Association won't expect anything from us youngsters anymore.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: But either way you're still waiting for your old man to pass the baton to you. What's the difference?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's nothing more than an arrangement to keep us in line. Once I inherit the Association, I will have to follow the rules.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: And the 'rules' go way beyond my father.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: That's why you've come to me to... uh, help you put on this play of yours?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That it is.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Du Yaoye... Is that your name, my lady?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: W-What about it?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: 'On this silent autumn night, lingering sorrows yet grapple my heart. A long night that never ceases.' Yaoye refers to the long night from that lovely poem.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Too bad, I prefer going out at twilight.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Since this is a deal though... what's in it for me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There's somebody out there, from the royal court, who wants what you have. But you didn't let them have it. Do you understand what that means?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: My friend never told me to hand it over. Besides, isn't he a member of said court?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Liang had you come all this way. He has something else for you, doesn't he?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Only trivial matters.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Whatever. I don't really care. It's just, now that it's come to this you won't be able to pretend you've got nothing to do with it anymore. No matter what you intend.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I can help you. At the very least, I can guarantee you'll make it back to Lungmen in one piece.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Fair point...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's a deal, then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's a deal...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Heh, talking to you is easier than I expected.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Relax, I may not want to be the innkeeper, but all my friends my age have more than a few things to say about our elders. And all of them follow my orders.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You say you don't want to take over the Association, but aren't you doing the same thing...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Times have changed.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Right, right.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I can't help but feel you're hiding something, but fine. It'll be nothing but trouble if they find me here.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Call me Lee.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: —Alright, Lee. We'll meet again!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The innkeeper may seem a kind, amiable man, but his daughter...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uncle Lee...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're visiting Uncle Liang, right?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Right... *Sigh*... I really don't want to go on this trip...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll keep an eye out for your dad.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: With any luck, I might even drag him back here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Oh, don't be like that... Don't expect too much either.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Yan is a big place, too big to find someone that easily.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Waai Fu...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Look, I need you to know. It doesn't matter if you're going to tell him off, hammer him with questions, or let bygones be bygones and fawn over him. If I do find him, you'll need to face him on your own.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's only when you catch your fool of a dad's shadow that he'll turn back to look at you. That's the kind of man he is.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll be in Shangshu for a while. If I hear anything about him, I'll let you know.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And... once you're ready, come find me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That prick Liang Xun... neglecting his guest like this without so much as telling me his next move...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hm... the tea isn't the best I've had, but the pot is quite the work of art. A fine teapot, indeed...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm... A full calligraphy set too... Fairly old-fashioned for a guest room. I see Liang Xun's tastes haven't changed.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Phew... That journey took it all out of me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm past due for a break. After all that abuse I've taken from him, I'm pooped—
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: —Where am I?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ao...
attributes.name: Strange Object
